document.full_text: one out of every 38 children in south korea may have autism, a surprisingly high number based on a new research approach that suggests autism is a global problem that is significantly underdiagnosed, researchers said on monday.
document.title: one in 38 kids in south korea may have autism: study
lines_and_colors: one out of every 38 children in south korea may have autism, a surprisingly high number based on a new research approach that suggests autism is a global problem that is significantly underdiagnosed, researchers said on monday.
